Deleting a Folder or Child Folder

If you have the appropriate privileges, you can delete a folder or child folder from a StarTeam project. This action removes all items associated with that folder from the project but does not delete the data from the database.

To delete a folder:

  1. Select the folder from the folder hierarchy in the left pane.

  2. Select Delete from the Folder or context menu. The message “Delete Folder Name?” displays.

  3. Click OK.
